phones.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
phones.description: The flagship Android experience with an incredible 200MP quad-camera system, S Pen support, and a bright Dynamic AMOLED 2X display.

phones.name: Apple iPhone 17 Pro Max
phones.description: Apple's top-tier phone with the A19 Pro chip, advanced triple-camera system, and an anti-reflective 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display.

phones.name: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL
phones.description: Features the Google Tensor G5 chip, best-in-class computational photography, and exclusive AI features for a pure Android experience.

phones.name: OnePlus 13
phones.description: A high-performance phone known for its speed, 100W Super VOOC fast charging, and a fluid 6.82-inch LTPO AMOLED display.

phones.name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
phones.description: A cutting-edge foldable smartphone with a massive 8-inch main display and a durable, thin design for ultimate productivity.

phones.name: Apple iPhone 17
phones.description: The standard flagship offering with an upgraded 1-120Hz display, powerful A19 chip, and robust software support.

phones.name: Motorola Razr Ultra (2025)
phones.description: A stylish flip-style foldable phone with a large external display and fast 68W wired and 30W wireless charging capabilities.

phones.name: Xiaomi 15 Ultra
phones.description: An international flagship known for its large 5410mAh battery and incredibly fast 90W Hyper Charging, featuring a premium camera array.

phones.name: Google Pixel 9a
phones.description: The best bargain phone with great camera quality and the same processing power as other Pixel 9 models, making it excellent value.

phones.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE
phones.description: The 'Fan Edition' offering a balanced mix of flagship features, including a 120Hz AMOLED screen and 45W charging, at a lower price point.
